content.rendered:
“D” Day                                                                                                                                        

                                                                                                  

ANNOUNCEMENTS

Monday, September 15, 2025

 

The HS Counseling Department will be hosting a college fair at Saratoga Springs High School on Thursday, September 25 from 6:30-8:00 PM in the Blue gymnasium. This is a wonderful opportunity for high school students to explore a variety of college options. We hope you will take advantage of these opportunities to explore a few two-year and four-year schools.

 

Listen up, NHS!  All NHS seniors should attend the meeting today, September 15th in the TA after school.  See your email and student square for the full list of dates.

 

The first meeting of the naturalist/ recycling club will be today after school in the cafeteria.

 

Are you passionate about books, culture, and adventure?  The Literature and Travel Club is open to all students! Join us to learn about the world of famous authors not just by their works but also by travelling to the places that inspired them. From local literacy landmarks, national, and international destinations we connect literature, culture, and history in exciting and meaningful ways. There will be snacks! We will be meeting Tuesday 9/16 in room B120, if you have any questions, please email j_gebhard@saratogaschools.org”

 

All students must have their student ID’s when purchasing school lunch.

 

On Tuesday September 16th, the Cave/Spelunking Club will be meeting for the first time in room 226 right after school. Please bring a friend and a sense of adventure. We will be discussing our first trip and some fundraising activities.

 

The first meeting of the Library Book Club will be on Tuesday, September 16, after school in the library classroom. Come share your favorite books and discover what we’ll be reading this year! Everyone is welcome—bring a friend and your love of reading!

 

Attention all sophomores, juniors and seniors.  Let’s go to Costa Rica and Panama in February of 2026.  There are limited spots available so you must act fast.  Those interested should attend the interest meeting with a parent or guardian on Thursday, September 18th at 5:00 in the High School Library.  ¡Nos vemos!

 

Interested in exploring exciting professional career paths? Join the Entrepreneurs and Business Professionals Club on Thursday, September 18th, right after school in Room D218. Whether you’re curious or already career-focused, all are welcomed, don’t miss out!

 

Petty Officer Plukett from the US Navy will be visiting during our student lunches on 9/15/25.

 

Sgt Gilbert from the US Army will be visiting during our student lunches on 9/16/25.

 

On Tuesday September 16th, right after school Best Buddies will be holding an informational meeting in the cafeteria. Come join us and bring a friend!

Science in the Community Club will be meeting on Tuesday September 16th after school in G238, where we will discuss officer positions and elections.

 

Yearbook Club meets on Tuesdays 09/16/25 in B114.

Late Buses will not start until Sept. 22.
